app.invite_description: Hoppscotch is an open source API development ecosystem. We designed a simple and intuitive interface for creating and managing your APIs. Hoppscotch is a tool that helps you build, test, document and share your APIs.
app.name: Hoppscotch
app.new_version_found: New version found. Refresh to update.

auth.account_exists: Account exists with different credential - Login to link both accounts
auth.we_sent_magic_link: We sent you a magic link!
auth.we_sent_magic_link_description: Check your inbox - we sent an email to {email}. It contains a magic link that will log you in.

collection.invalid_name: Please provide a name for the collection
collection.name: My New Collection
collection.name_length_insufficient: Collection name should be at least 3 characters long

confirm.exit_team: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
confirm.logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirm.remove_collection: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this collection?
confirm.remove_environment: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this environment?
confirm.remove_folder: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this folder?
confirm.remove_history: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all history?
confirm.remove_request: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this request?
confirm.remove_team: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
confirm.remove_telemetry: Are you sure you want to opt-out of Telemetry?
confirm.sync: Would you like to restore your workspace from cloud? This will discard your local progress.

documentation.generate_message: Import any Hoppscotch collection to generate API documentation on-the-go.

empty.authorization: This request does not use any authorization
empty.body: This request does not have a body
empty.documentation: Connect to a GraphQL endpoint to view documentation
empty.headers: This request does not have any headers
empty.parameters: This request does not have any parameters
empty.pending_invites: There are no pending invites for this team
empty.profile: Login in to view your profile
empty.schema: Connect to a GraphQL endpoint to view schema

empty.tests: There are no tests for this request

environment.nested_overflow: nested environment variables are limited to 10 levels

error.browser_support_sse: This browser doesn't seems to have Server Sent Events support.
error.gql_prettify_invalid_query: Couldn't prettify an invalid query, solve query syntax errors and try again
error.invalid_link_description: The link you clicked is invalid or expired.
error.json_prettify_invalid_body: Couldn't prettify an invalid body, solve json syntax errors and try again
error.network_error: There seems to be a network error. Please try again.

export.require_github: Login with GitHub to create secret gist
export.title: Export

folder.invalid_name: Please provide a name for the folder
folder.name_length_insufficient: Folder name should be at least 3 characters long

helpers.authorization: The authorization header will be automatically generated when you send the request.
helpers.network_fail: Unable to reach the API endpoint. Check your network connection or select a different Interceptor and try again.
helpers.offline: You seem to be offline. Data in this workspace might not be up to date.
helpers.post_request_tests: Test scripts are written in JavaScript, and are run after the response is received.
helpers.pre_request_script: Pre-request scripts are written in JavaScript, and are run before the request is sent.
helpers.script_fail: It seems there is a glitch in the pre-request script. Check the error below and fix the script accordingly.
helpers.test_script_fail: There seems to be an error with test script. Please fix the errors and run tests again
helpers.tests: Write a test script to automate debugging.

import.failed: Error while importing: format not recognized
import.json_description: Import collections from a Hoppscotch Collections JSON file
import.title: Import

profile.editor_description: Editors can add, edit, and delete requests.
profile.email_verification_mail: A verification email has been sent to your email address. Please click on the link to verify your email address.
profile.no_permission: You do not have permission to perform this action.
profile.owner_description: Owners can add, edit, and delete requests, collections and team members.
profile.roles_description: Roles are used to control access to the shared collections.
profile.viewer_description: Viewers can only view and use requests.

request.name: Request name

settings.experiments_notice: This is a collection of experiments we're working on that might turn out to be useful, fun, both, or neither. They're not final and may not be stable, so if something overly weird happens, don't panic. Just turn the dang thing off. Jokes aside,
settings.extensions_use_toggle: Use the browser extension to send requests (if present)
settings.official_proxy_hosting: Official Proxy is hosted by Hoppscotch.
settings.proxy_use_toggle: Use the proxy middleware to send requests
settings.sync_description: These settings are synced to cloud.
settings.telemetry_helps_us: Telemetry helps us to personalize our operations and deliver the best experience to you.
settings.use_experimental_url_bar: Use experimental URL bar with environment highlighting

state.bulk_mode_placeholder:
Entries are separated by newline
Keys and values are separated by :
Prepend # to any row you want to add but keep disabled

support.team: Get in touch with the team
